<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make the smaller rank tree a direct child or the root of high rank tree.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BB1G-&gt;Rank &lt; BB2G-&gt;Rank)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">      BB1G-&gt;Group = BB2G;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">      BB2G-&gt;Group = BB1G;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the ranks are the same, increment root of one tree by one.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BB1G-&gt;Rank == BB2G-&gt;Rank)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">        BB1G-&gt;Rank++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> handleCoroSuspendEdge(Edge &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We must not add instrumentation to the BB representing the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &quot;suspend&quot; path, else CoroSplit won&#39;t be able to lower</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// llvm.coro.suspend to a tail call. We do want profiling info for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the other branches (resume/destroy). So we do 2 things:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1 we prefer instrumenting those other edges by setting the weight</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    of the &quot;suspend&quot; edge to max, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2 we mark the edge as &quot;Removed&quot; to guarantee it is not considered</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    for instrumentation. That could technically happen:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    (from test/Transforms/Coroutines/coro-split-musttail.ll)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %suspend = call i8 @llvm.coro.suspend(token %save, i1 false)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// switch i8 %suspend, label %exit &#91;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   i8 0, label %await.ready</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   i8 1, label %exit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#93;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Traverse the CFG using a stack. Find all the edges and assign the weight.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Edges with large weight will be put into MST first so they are less likely</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to be instrumented.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t EntryWeight =</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we want to instrument the entry count, lower the weight to 0</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Entry/exit edge adjustment heurisitic:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// prefer instrumenting entry edge over exit edge</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// if possible. Those exit edges may never have a chance to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// executed (for instance the program is an event handling loop)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// before the profile is asynchronously dumped.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If EntryIncoming and ExitOutgoing has similar weight, make sure</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ExitOutging is selected as the min-edge. Similarly, if EntryOutgoing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and ExitIncoming has similar weight, make sure ExitIncoming becomes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the min-edge.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t EntryInWeight = EntryWeight;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (EntryInWeight &gt;= MaxExitOutWeight &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">        EntryInWeight &#42; 2 &lt; MaxExitOutWeight &#42; 3) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">      EntryIncoming-&gt;Weight = MaxExitOutWeight;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ExitOutgoing-&gt;Weight = EntryInWeight + 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MaxEntryOutWeight &gt;= MaxExitInWeight &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">        MaxEntryOutWeight &#42; 2 &lt; MaxExitInWeight &#42; 3) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">      EntryOutgoing-&gt;Weight = MaxExitInWeight;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ExitIncoming-&gt;Weight = MaxEntryOutWeight + 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Traverse all the edges and compute the Minimum Weight Spanning Tree</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// First, put all the critical edge with landing-pad as the Dest to MST.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This works around the insufficient support of critical edges split</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Ei : AllEdges) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Ei-&gt;Removed)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instrumenting the entry edge:</span></CodeLine>
